review: Brand new out of the box and the port for the DC plug is loose. If the box is moved at all, the power goes off, then on again. It is not the DC cable as I tried a different brand new DC plug and the problem persisted.I ordered a replacement from Amazon using chat. That process was seamless and painless. The new one arrived within a few days for free. I can print the return label for this dud and send it back without paying for shipping.However, I still give this one star based on receiving a dud.If the replacement works good, I will give it a better star rating.
author: Jay Usher "Jay Usher"

review: Great in every aspect.  Superb picture  and sound.  Great selection of movies, TV, games, and apps, especially if you are a Prime member.  Well worth the cost.  If I get decent reception for local channels via a HDTV antenna, I will use those with Amazon Fire/Prime for my viewing needs and "cut the cable" of my satellite service - This will save me $1,200/year!.
